node.doctext:
Available for Download

If you decide to download it, PLEASE PROVIDE FEEDBACK (positive or negative).
Additional details will be displayed at the [E2 Link and Logger Client] writeup.

What is it?

[GUI] Interface, multi-user, multi-threaded client with:

  • Chatterbox Client
  • E2 Node Tracker
  • Homenode List Generator
  • Nodegel Visualizer
  • Writeup Editor/Offline Scratch Pad
  • Auto-Soft Linker
  • ...[E2 Link and Logger Client|and more]

Requirements

  • Windows 98/2000/Me/XP
  • [Microsoft .NET] Framework (download information at the URL above)
  • Microsoft [Microsoft Data Access Components] (MDAC) 2.6 or greater (download information at the URL above)
node.title: E2 Link and Logger Client
